job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience in Site Reliability, DevOps and/or Software&nbsp;Delivery for commercial&nbsp;large scale&nbsp;cloud&nbsp;software or services   
  - Good understanding of public cloud offerings such as Azure, Google Cloud or AWS   
  - Experience&nbsp;with&nbsp;coding&nbsp;languages (C++, C#, Java, .NET) and&nbsp;proficiency&nbsp;in&nbsp;debugging, and live-site troubleshooting during an outage   
  - Strong background in monitoring, disaster recovery, and automation   
  - Excellent communication skills&nbsp;both oral and written   
  - Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform or other Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD preferred   
  - Our ideal candidate will demonstrate strong customer empathy, show a strong bias for action, be adaptable and possess strong interpersonal skill
